title: Home
cleaned_text: top of page Chinese Holistic Health Center Acupuncture and Chinese Medicine in Central Ohio | Chinese Holistic Health Center is your trusted place for compassionate holistic healing and Pain Management in Central Ohio. We aim to get to the root of your health concerns, restore your bodies health, revitalize your mind, and improve your quality of life. - Are you ready for change and want less stress, no pain, and a happier heart? - Would you like to increase your energy, improve sleep, release tension, and revitalize all systems of the body? - Do you want to manage an autoimmune disease or other chronic health condition that could ultimately lead to a transformed body and mind? If you answered yes to any of these questions, call us or click schedule an appointment now to begin your journey of healing. Come see Dr. Nancy Wang, our experienced Chinese Medicine Practitioner in Central Ohio. Chinese Holistic Health Center LLC Columbus Acupuncture Therapy LLC 777 Carle Ave., Lewis Center, Ohio 43035 6:30pm bottom of page
